text: Mubazo kubaza kuri ibi bintu vyose munyuma yaho umaze gushikirwa n’ubumenyi wewe n’ubabwire uti:- nimuze duhamagare ibibondo vyacu hamwe n’ibibondo vyanyu hamwe n’abakenyezi b’iwacu hamwe n’abakenyezi b’iwanyu hamwe natwebwe namwe, hanyuma duce dusaba n’ubwitonzi ntangere dusabe umuvumo ku Mana hanyuma ubamanukire abo babeshi bose
